message.content:
cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.SOC, cs.IR, cs.LG 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as it deals with the problem of rumor detection in social media. It also involves the use of graph-based methods to model the relationships among tweets, retweets, and users, which falls under the scope of cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.SOC (Social and Information Networks). Additionally, the paper utilizes attention mechanisms to encode the semantic information of related retweets, which is a common technique in natural language processing (NLP) and falls under the scope of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
